overview: YOU ME & OMD was a livestream concert in aid of OMD's hard-working crew who have not had any work since February 2020 and face huge uncertainty for the future as a consequence of the COVID-19 pandemic.  The concert took place on 19th June 2021 and featured selections from the band's seminal album Architecture & Morality as well as plenty of the greatest hits.
tagline: DVD Release of Concert Livestream (OMD aka Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark)
title: YOU ME & OMD
